vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.16;
son of: Jehallelel (H3094);
brother of: Ziph (H2128J), Ziphah (H2129) and Asarel (H0840)
§ Tiria = "fear"
a Judaite, son of Jehaleleel
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Jahaleel; tribu de Judá
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
提利 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "害怕"
猶大人耶哈利勒的兒子 (代上4:16)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
提利 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "害怕"
犹大人耶哈利勒的儿子 (代上4:16)
